Docs.param: The I2C device used for communication.
The GPIO Controller used for interrupt handling
The pin number where the interrupt line is attached on the GPIO controller
True (the default) if the GPIO controller shall be disposed when disposing this instance
Docs.summary: Initialize a new Ads1115 device connected through I2C with an additional GPIO controller for interrupt handling.
This event fires when a new value is available (in conversion ready mode) or the comparator threshold is exceeded. Requires setup through or .

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ComparatorLatching : Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorLatching with get, set

Docs.summary: Comparator latching mode. If enabled, the ALRT/RDY Pin will be kept signaled until the conversion value is read. Only relevant when the comparator is enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ComparatorMode As ComparatorMode

Docs.summary: Comparator mode. Only relevant if the comparator trigger event is set up and is changed by .

MemberSignature.Value: member this.ComparatorPolarity : Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorPolarity with get, set

Docs.summary: Comparator polarity. Indicates whether the rising or the falling edge of the ALRT/RDY Pin is relevant. Default: Low (falling edge)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ComparatorQueue As ComparatorQueue

Docs.summary: Minimum number of samples exceeding the lower/upper threshold before the ALRT pin is asserted. This can only be set with .

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DataRate : Iot.Device.Ads1115.DataRate with get, set

Docs.summary: ADS1115 Data Rate. The number of conversions per second that will take place. One conversion will take "1/rate" seconds to become ready. If in power-down mode, only one conversion will happen automatically, then another request is required. Setting this property will wait until a new value is available.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DeviceMode : Iot.Device.Ads1115.DeviceMode with get, set

Docs.summary: ADS1115 operation mode. When set to the chip continously measures the input and the values can be read directly. If set to the chip enters idle mode after each conversion and a new value will be requested each time a read request is performed. This is the recommended setting when frequently swapping between input channels, because a change of the channel requires a new conversion anyway.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Cleanup. Failing to dispose this class, especially when callbacks are active, may lead to undefined behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnableComparator (short lowerValue, short upperValue, Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorMode mode, Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorQueue queueLength);

.method public hidebysig instance void EnableComparator(int16 lowerValue, int16 upperValue, valuetype Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorMode mode, valuetype Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorQueue queueLength) cil managed
Public Sub EnableComparator (lowerValue As Short, upperValue As Short, mode As ComparatorMode, queueLength As ComparatorQueue)
member this.EnableComparator : int16 * int16 * Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorMode * Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorQueue -> unit

Docs.param: Minimum number of samples that must exceed the threshold to trigger the event
Docs.summary: Enable comparator callback mode. In traditional comparator mode, the callback is triggered each time the measured value exceeds the given upper value (for the given queueLength number of samples). It deasserts when the lower value is reached. In window comparator mode, the callback is triggered each time the measured value exceeds the given upper value or gets less than the given lower value.
Docs.exception: The GPIO Controller for the interrupt handler has not been set up

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnableComparator (UnitsNet.ElectricPotential lowerValue, UnitsNet.ElectricPotential upperValue, Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorMode mode, Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorQueue queueLength);

member this.EnableComparator : UnitsNet.ElectricPotential * UnitsNet.ElectricPotential * Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorMode * Iot.Device.Ads1115.ComparatorQueue -> unit

Docs.param: Minimum number of samples that must exceed the threshold to trigger the event
Docs.summary: Enable comparator callback mode. In traditional comparator mode, the callback is triggered each time the measured value exceeds the given upper value (for the given queueLength number of samples). It deasserts when the lower value is reached. In window comparator mode, the callback is triggered each time the measured value exceeds the given upper value or gets less than the given lower value.
Docs.exception: The GPIO Controller for the interrupt handler has not been set up

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnableConversionReady() cil managed

Docs.summary: Enable conversion ready event. The event fires each time a new value is available after this method is called.
Docs.exception: The conversion ready event is already set up or no GPIO Controller configured for interrupt handling.

Docs.summary: Returns the sampling frequency in Hz for the given data rate enumeration member.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.InputMultiplexer : Iot.Device.Ads1115.InputMultiplexer with get, set

Docs.summary: ADS1115 Input Multiplexer. This selects the channel(s) for the next read operation, . Setting this property will wait until a value is available from the newly selected input channel.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype UnitsNet.ElectricPotential MaxVoltageFromMeasuringRange(valuetype Iot.Device.Ads1115.MeasuringRange measuringRange) cil managed
Public Function MaxVoltageFromMeasuringRange (measuringRange As MeasuringRange) As ElectricPotential

Docs.summary: Returns the voltage assigned to the given MeasuringRange enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MeasuringRange : Iot.Device.Ads1115.MeasuringRange with get, set

Docs.summary: ADS1115 Programmable Gain Amplifier This sets the maximum value that can be measured. Regardless of this setting, the input value on any pin must not exceed VDD + 0.3V, so high ranges are only usable with a VDD of more than 5V. Setting this property will wait until a new value is available.

Docs.summary: Convert Raw Data to Voltage
Docs.returns: Voltage, based on the current measuring range

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int16 ReadRaw() cil managed

Docs.summary: Read Raw Data. If in PowerDown (single-shot) mode, one new sample is requested first.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int16 ReadRaw(valuetype Iot.Device.Ads1115.InputMultiplexer inputMultiplexer) cil managed
Public Function ReadRaw (inputMultiplexer As InputMultiplexer) As Short

Docs.summary: Reads the next raw value, first switching to the given input and ranges.
Docs.remarks: For performance reasons, it is advised to use this method if quick readings with different input channels are required, instead of setting all the properties first and then calling .

Docs.summary: Reads the next raw value, first switching to the given input and ranges.
Docs.remarks: For performance reasons, it is advised to use this method if quick readings with different settings (i.e. different input channels) are required, instead of setting all the properties first and then calling .

Docs.summary: Returns the electric potential (voltage) of the currently selected input.
Docs.returns: The measured voltage of the currently selected input channel. In volts.
